LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.0.label: Expanded Cargo Space
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.0.description: Increase the amount of cargo that can be hauled by this vehicle.
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.1.label: Reinforced Armor
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.1.description: Weld a layer of reinforced obsidian plating to the vehicle, increasing its armor value at the cost of increasing vehicle mass and lowering acceleration.
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.2.label: Armored Wheels
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.2.description: Improve the armor of the wheels by covering them in thick obsidian plating.
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.3.label: Off Road Tires
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.3.description: Replace the tires with deep threaded tires that provide more traction and will allow the vehicle to move significantly faster offroad.
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.4.label: Improved Exhaust
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.4.description: Change the exhaust system of the vehicle into a more efficient one, decreasing the visibility of the vehicle and improving fuel efficiency.
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.5.label: Big Fueltanks
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.5.description: Attach two big fueltanks to the bottom of the vehicle to allow it to travel greater distances without the risk of running out of fuel.
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.6.label: Cargo Capacity
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.6.description: Improve the cargo capacity of the vehicle slightly.
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.7.label: Armor
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.7.description: Reinforce the armor of the vehicle slightly.
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.8.label: Speed
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.8.description: Improve the engine of the vehicle, allowing it to reach higher maximum speed.
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.9.label: Acceleration
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.9.description: Improve shifting capabilities of transmission to increase acceleration speed of the vehicle slightly.
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.10.label: Fuel Consumption
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.10.description: Improve the exhaust system of the vehicle, improving fuel efficiency slightly.
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.11.label: Fuel Capacity
LanguageData.ODC_MCV_UpgradeTree.nodes.11.description: Increase the size of the fueltank slightly.
